mapper.select: SELECT member_idx,member_id,member_name,pwd,birthday,phone,gender,zip_code,addr1,addr2,point,profile,reg_date,admin_YN,modify_date,leave_date,status FROM tbl_member WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND status = ''
mapper.update: update SET tbl_member point=#{point} where member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (member_id, member_name, pwd, birthday, phone, gender, zip_code, addr1, addr2, admin_YN, terms1, terms2, terms3, terms4) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_name}, #{pwd}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{zip_code}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, 'N', #{terms1}, #{terms2}, #{terms3}, #{terms3})
